description: This tropical salad is light and refreshing, perfect for sunny evenings.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Plant-based,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Prawn, Mango & Coconut Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large mango, peeled, stoned and sliced
1 large red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the sesame oil, half of the lime juice, coconut milk and honey together to make a dressing. Add the sliced red onions to a bowl and pour over the rest of the lime juice. Leave to steep for 10 minutes.
Mix the baby spinach, mango, mint and coconut flakes in a large bowl. Tip in the prawns and red onion, drizzle over the dressing and toss well.
